text: where are you trying to get this?
not enough information here to understand the error
Yeah in a private content but the user is accessing this using sso login

Okay. I’m not familiar with setting this up with private content — but I’m not sure sso makes a difference. 

You have to grant access to private content via list memberships. That means the contact that logs in is connected to a HubSpot contact record. 

If you do something like {{contact|tojson}} on your private content page, then go into an incognito window (so you aren’t logged into HubSpot as that causes a conflict with contact data), goto private content, sso login, goto private content page, you should see the contact data displayed in json format
I cannot believe because you login via sso that you aren’t connected to a contact record.
There would be no way to match your available lists.
Yeah that’s correct but we need to make sure that contact should be created in signup

Contact can’t sign into private content without being invited and being sent a url where they create their password. 

Are you sure you are talking about private content in HubSpot?
